org.switchyard.validate

Class ValidationFailureException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.switchyard.HandlerException
          • org.switchyard.validate.ValidationFailureException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class ValidationFailureException
extends HandlerException
    Represents a validation failure when handling an exchange.
    See Also:
